title: Summoners' Society Content Team!

embed.description: We are looking for people to help us create League of Legends related content to be posted on Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, and streamed on Twitch. We are looking for people with video editing skills, graphic designers, casters, artists, and general entertainers.

body:
Hello, Summoners!

We are looking for more awesome people to join out the content team. We have some really awesome opportunities coming up.

Grpahics designers, videos editors, artists, cosplayers, etc..

If you have any questions please feel free to DM the Summoners' Society Facebook Page for further information. 

{{champion:17}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:40}}
